reasoning: GBS is an acute autoimmune neurological disorder with well-documented incidence around 1-2 per 100k person-years globally. Incidence metric appropriate for acute condition. Estimated 1.7 per 100k based on population-based epidemiological studies and surveillance data.
source: Rees JH et al. (1998). The epidemiology of Guillain-Barre syndrome in the UK. J Neurol Neurosurg Psychiatry. 64(1):59-64
